name: Chess Problems
description: Collection of chess puzzles.

name: Chess strategy
description: HTML version of chess strategy by Edward Lasker.

name: Sicilian Dragon
description: Attacking plans for black.

name: fenparser by tlehman
description: A parser for Forsyth-Edwards Notation wriitten in Python.

name: fen by ucarion
description: A Rust Forsyth-Edwards notation parser with proper error handling.

name: fen-diagram by andyherbert
description: JavaScript for generating chess diagrams using Forsyth-Edwards notation.

name: latrunculorum
description: A simple chess bot in Python.

name: Chessbot
description: Bot written in Java.

name: chess.js
description: chess.js, Structured code for chess authentication.

name: npm chess package
description: An algebraic notation driven chess engine that can validate board position and produce a list of viable moves.

name: Chessnut
description: Chessnut is a simple chess board model written in Python. It provides functionality of parsing FEN and generating a list of legal moves for each FEN representation.

name: multiplayerchess.com
description: A simple single page chess playing application facilitating the play of chess.

name: lichess.org
description: One of the most mature platforms for playing chess on the internet. It is open source too. It is equipped with daily puzzles and an TV to spectate other matches.

name: chess24.com
description: Play as well as learn chess from chess24 with the best of tutorials.

name: chessbase.com
description: Lucrative, single page application for playing chess.

name: chess.com
description: Learn and play chess with over 5 million other users.

name: chesscademy.com
description: Watch videos, solve puzzles, and play games. All for free. (Works similar to Khan Academy.)

name: chesstempo.com
description: Online chess tactics training site.

name: chessprogramming.wikispaces.com
description: Repository of information about programming computers to play chess.

name: freechess.org
description: The 'Free Internet Chess Server' (FICS) is one of the oldest Internet chess servers. There are lots of client applications for almost every device, operation system or webbrowser available.

name: Chessboard.js
description: chessboard.js is a standalone JavaScript chess board.

name: chess-board
description: A web component for displaying chess positions. It takes FEN string as input and renders the board as output.

name: jchess
description: A jQuery based JavaScript library for parsing and displaying chess games. Currently takes FEN and PGN as inputs.

name: Chessboard-js
description: A responsive mobile-first JavaScript chessboard library.

name: FEN
description: A FEN "record" defines a particular game position, all in one text line and using only the ASCII character set.

name: PNG
description: PGN is structured "for easy reading and writing by human users and for easy parsing and generation by computer programs."

name: ICCF numeric notation
description: Official chess game notation for all International Correspondence Chess Federation games.

description: Talk on how chess can revolutionize learning by Cody Pomeranz.
